description: A label for a button that allows people to create a new tag based on text they have typed into an adjacent tag search bar when there are no search results.
The placeholder text in a search box.
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to abort an in-progress operation
A message that appears when a user has searched for tag text but no matches have been found.
Verb, infinitive form. Button to commit action of tagging an item
A message that appears in a lag list when there are no available tags to display.
Tooltip message displayed on a tag item to let the user know they can manage the tags in the list
